member.name: T:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder
member.summary: The builder class to enable the fluent API.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.AllowCredentials
member.summary: Sets a flag to allow credentials on requests.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.AllowMethods(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the methods (e.g. "GET", "POST", etc.) allowed on requests.
member.remarks: Although the HTTP spec does not allow wild-cards for methods, this library does. Where a wildcard is used, the value of the Access-Control-Request-Methods request header will be copied into the Access-Control-Allow-Methods response header.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.AllowHeaders(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the request header names allowed on requests.
member.remarks: Although the HTTP spec does not allow wild-cards for headers, this library does. Where a wildcard is used, the value of the Access-Control-Request-Headers request header will be copied into the Access-Control-Allow-Headers response header.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.ExposeHeaders(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the response header names that it is OK for the client to use.
member.remarks: This method does not allow wildcards.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.MaxAge(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the maximum length of time, in seconds, that the result of a pre-flighted request can be cached.
member.param: The number of seconds the result can be cached.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.MaxAge(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the maximum length of time that the result of a pre-flighted request can be cached.
member.param: The time the result can be cached.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.UseStopStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a custom HTTP status code to use when halting an invalid CORS request.

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.CorsBuilder.Build
member.summary: Builds the OWIN AppFunc delegate for the module.
Implicit cast to the AppFunc delegate.

member.name: T:Simple.Owin.Cors
member.summary: Static class for starting Cors definitions

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.Cors.Create(Simple.Owin.CorsMiddleware.OriginMatcher[])
member.summary: Creates a builder with the specified origins.
member.returns: A that can be built upon using the fluent API
member.remarks:
Thanks to the magic of implicit casting, you can pass multiple types to Create:
Strings with the full Origin name, e.g. "http://example.com",
instances for more complex matching, and
functions that take a and return a .

member.name: M:Simple.Owin.Cors.Wildcard
member.summary: Creates a builder that allows all origins.
member.returns: A that can be built upon using the fluent API
